elements.text:
TURNING IN BED

Over the past week, do you usually have trouble turning over in bed?

buttons: 1::1: Slight: I have a bit of trouble turning, but I do not need any help.
2::2: Mild: I have a lot of trouble turning and need occasional help from someone else.
3::3: Moderate: To turn over I often need help from someone else.
4::4: Severe: I am unable to turn over without help from someone else.
